qa.question: Main Phone Use
qa.answer: WhatsApp, YouTube, class notes, online shopping.

qa.question: Phone Sharing
qa.answer: I don’t share my phone; it has personal chats and study materials.

qa.question: Favorite Apps
qa.answer: WhatsApp, Instagram, YouTube. Know apps ask for contacts/location but not sure why.

qa.question: Permission Reading
qa.answer: Just allow to make app work faster.

qa.question: App Trust
qa.answer: If college friends use it, I trust it.

qa.question: Content Deletion
qa.answer: Yes, delete chats I don’t want others to see.

qa.question: Phone Repair
qa.answer: Remove photos, log out of WhatsApp, don’t know how to remove everything.

qa.question: Help with Problems
qa.answer: Ask roommate, feel awkward if she sees private pictures.

qa.question: Trusted People
qa.answer: Only sister or best friend.

qa.question: Code Words
qa.answer: Yes, nicknames and emojis in chats.

qa.question: Helped Someone
qa.answer: Helped uncle install COVID health app, didn’t explain permissions.

qa.question: Permission Control
qa.answer: Learned to turn off location.

qa.question: Warning Messages
qa.answer: Uninstall apps or don’t open links.

qa.question: Access to Contacts/Photos
qa.answer: Think they use for recommendations and ads.

qa.question: Repair Hesitation
qa.answer: Yes, especially with personal photos/documents.

qa.question: Repair Shop Behavior
qa.answer: Shopkeeper opened gallery once, now I delete before going.

qa.question: Password/Lock
qa.answer: Yes, fingerprint and PIN.

qa.question: Local vs International Apps
qa.answer: Prefer what friends use, doesn’t matter origin.

qa.question: Tech Help
qa.answer: Ask roommate or Google.

qa.question: Social Influence
qa.answer: Friends warn about scams/fake apps.

scenarios.Broken Phone: Delete gallery, log out of accounts before repair.
scenarios.Family Sharing: Close apps and clear notifications if cousin borrows phone.
scenarios.New App with Permissions: Skip if asks too much, ask friend if unsure.
scenarios.Helping Elderly Relative: Install app, explain a little but not privacy.
scenarios.Giving Away Phone: Format and ask cousin to double-check erase.
scenarios.Cloud Surprise: Photos came back after deleting, now switch off auto backup.
scenarios.Free Public WiFi: Use only for YouTube/browsing, not sensitive apps.
scenarios.Emergency Transfer: Help only if trust and confirm situation.
